articles.title: Doritos Gives Their Most Iconic Snack a Dye-Free Makeover
articles.author: Julie Andrews
articles.summary: Frito Lay has launched a new line of snacks called "Simply NKD", which includes dye-free versions of the original Doritos and Cheetos flavors. The Simply NKD Doritos Nacho Cheese will not contain Red 40, Yellow 5, or Yellow 6, and the Simply NKD Cheetos Crunchy Cheese will not contain Yellow 6. The new snacks appear to be available at Sam's Club and through Instacart.

articles.title: Bend-born Cuppa Yo frozen yogurt opens latest location, by the new Costco
articles.author: Barney Lerten
articles.summary: Cuppa Yo has opened a new location in Bend, Oregon, next to the new Costco. The grand opening was on October 17th at 12:00 PM PST. The new location will offer Cuppa Yo's signature frozen yogurt flavors and toppings.

articles.title: Dialogue AI: $6 Million Seed Funding Raised For Transforming Customer Research With Live AI-Led Conversations
articles.author: Amit Chowdhry
articles.summary: Dialogue AI, an AI-native customer research platform, has secured $6 million in seed funding. This funding will accelerate the platform's product development and expand its AI-powered research capabilities. Dialogue AI's platform helps businesses gather real-time customer insights at scale using a live conversational AI interviewer.

articles.title: Brooks Ghost Max 3 Review: Hauntingly Soft, But Not Suitable For All
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: The latest Ghost Max features a refined upper and plush foam. Testers evaluated the shoe's performance over several months.

articles.title: Buy Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge with free delivery
articles.author: Abdul
articles.summary: Samsung is launching the Galaxy S25 Edge, a new smartphone featuring a Snapdragon Gen 4 processor with AI acceleration, a 200MP AI Quad Camera system, and a 6.9-inch ProScaler Edge AMOLED Display. The device also includes a long-lasting 5000mAh battery with superfast charging and is secured by Samsung Knox security and AI data protection.

articles.title: I've found a great gaming TV – and right now it's cheaper than ever
articles.author: Steve Hogarty
articles.summary: LG has introduced the C5 series of TVs, the latest in their C series, designed for gaming with features enhancing overall viewing. Key features include four HDMI 2.1 ports, an upgraded Alpha a9 Gen 8 AI processor, and support for Dolby Vision and HDR10. With a native 144Hz refresh rate and low input lag, the C5 also supports Nvidia and AMD's variable refresh rates for an optimized gaming experience.

articles.title: Charmin announces new toilet paper roll designed to last up to a month
articles.summary: Charmin has announced a new toilet paper roll. This new roll is designed to last up to a month for consumers.

articles.title: Samsung may unveil its tri-fold phone this month, here's what we want to know
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to unveil its new tri-fold smartphone, potentially named the Galaxy G Fold, at the APEC Summit. This device features two hinges, three displays, a combined battery capacity exceeding 5,000mAh and a Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 processor. The phone is rumored to have a price between $2,500 and $3,000.

articles.title: My favorite product releases this week: Pokémon, July, Ninja and more
articles.author: Rikka Altland
articles.summary: Several companies launched new products this week. Nintendo released Pokémon Legends: Z-A for the Nintendo Switch 2. July Luggage debuted the CaseSafe lineup with integrated Apple Find My tracking. Razer launched the Cinnamoroll Edition collection of gaming accessories. Ninja introduced the Crispi Pro air fryer with enhanced features. Lululemon partnered with Erewhon for a casual activewear line. Lego expanded its Speed Champions series with a DeLorean model. Asus, in partnership with Microsoft, launched the ROG Xbox Ally gaming handheld. Apple released the 14-Inch MacBook Pro M5 and iPad Pro M5 with new M5 processors.

articles.title: My favorite product releases this week: Pokémon, July, Ninja and more
articles.author: Rikka Altland
articles.summary: Pokémon and Ninja had product releases this week. The releases are among Rikka Altland's favorite.

articles.title: Banking with MrBeast?
articles.author: Eve Upton-Clark
articles.summary: MrBeast has filed a trademark application for a new financial service called MrBeast Financial, which includes a mobile app and online services for banking, financial advisory, and crypto exchange. The service targets MrBeast's young audience and aligns with plans to expand into financial services.

articles.title: 8 Travel Must-Haves That Make Airport Security Lines Feel Faster
articles.author: Alex Barrientos
articles.summary: The Canon Ivy 2 Mini Photo Printer allows travelers to create instant keepsakes, transforming phone photos into tangible memories. A palm-sized projector offers big entertainment in a tiny package with auto-focus and keystone correction. Additionally, rideable luggage is introduced to provide battery-powered mobility throughout airport terminals.

articles.title: OpenAI's own support bot has no idea how ChatGPT works
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: ChatGPT's customer support bot, a service offered by OpenAI, is exhibiting hallucinations. This means the AI is providing inaccurate or fabricated information when responding to support questions, impacting the quality and reliability of the service.

articles.title: How Entrepreneurs Can Spot Billion-Dollar Business Ideas Hiding in Plain Sight
articles.author: Ashot Gabrelyanov
articles.summary: Philipp Batura launched virtual labels like Gatas Only on Roblox, selling over a million avatar items monthly. Japan's LINE, led by CEO Takeshi Idezawa, introduced digital stickers, evolving into a significant revenue stream. Min-Liang Tan, co-founder and CEO of Razer, started with gaming mice and expanded into a lifestyle brand.

articles.title: Thinner, stronger, smarter: Motorola's new phone beats iPhone Air at its own game
articles.author: Global Desk
articles.summary: Motorola is anticipated to launch the Moto Edge 70, an ultra-thin smartphone with a focus on battery life. The phone is expected to feature a 4,800 mAh silicon carbide battery, a 50MP rear camera, 68W wired and 15W wireless charging, and water/dust resistance. The Moto Edge 70 is anticipated to debut later this year, likely in November.

articles.title: Thinner, stronger, smarter: Motorola's new phone beats iPhone Air at its own game
articles.author: The Economic Times
articles.summary: Motorola is preparing to launch the Moto Edge 70, an ultra-thin smartphone intended to compete in the market.

articles.title: Turning Screens Into Stores: NBTV's Nick Buzzell On The Future Of Shoppable TV
articles.author: Jason Damata
articles.summary: NBTV has launched Buy Bar, a same-screen technology enabling viewers to purchase products directly from video content on connected TVs and mobile devices. This technology is integrated into platforms like Spirits Network and Golf Nation, allowing viewers to buy products featured in the shows without leaving the viewing experience.

articles.title: Why trust is key with synthetic data in the agentic era
articles.author: Joe Depa
articles.summary: EY is pioneering an agentic AI program using synthetic data to build its first finance agents. Their digital finance copilot uses synthetic data to power AI, supporting analysts with insight generation and variance analysis. Client Zero deployment of the copilot resulted in a 60% reduction in time spent on manual tasks and enhanced auditability.

articles.title: Allen Iverson Launches New Craft THC Soda, IVERSON, With Viola
articles.author: Billboard
articles.summary: Allen Iverson is launching a new craft THC Soda.

articles.title: Indiegogo Launches Next-Generation Crowdfunding Platform
articles.summary: Indiegogo has launched a completely reimagined crowdfunding platform with advanced creator tools, enhanced trust and verification. The new platform includes features like an Advanced Pledge Manager, support for 20+ global payment methods, and Endgame, a post-campaign optimization tool.

articles.title: HONOR Teases the Future of Smartphones with the Upcoming 'Robot Phone'
articles.author: arabtimes
articles.summary: HONOR teased the upcoming HONOR Robot Phone, an innovative AI-powered device combining advanced sensing and human intention, set to be unveiled at MWC 2026. This represents a significant advancement for HONOR in intelligent mobile devices and user interaction.

articles.title: Saginaw Twp. Crumbl opens
articles.summary: Crumbl opened its first store in Saginaw. This marks the launch of their cookie products and service in that location.

articles.title: Natural Nine Boosts Personal Care Portfolio With Science-Backed Innovations
articles.author: BERNAMA
articles.summary: Natural Nine, a South Korean healthcare and beauty specialist, will launch a women's cleanser in March. The company aims to introduce a product that safely and gently cares for sensitive areas. Their existing Leoclean Men's Cleanser offers antibacterial properties and relief for skin issues.

articles.title: We have Xiaomi 17 Pro Max at home.
articles.author: Dominic Preston
articles.summary: Nuu Mobile launched the B40, the first US phone featuring a second screen, priced at $299.99. The phone includes a Dimensity 7050 chip and a 64-megapixel main camera.

articles.title: The surprisingly simple coffee upgrade that has 300+ Wayfair shoppers calling it ‘the best part of my morning'
articles.author: Rachel Morrison
articles.summary: Wayfair is offering the Nespresso VertuoPlus Deluxe with Aeroccino Milk Frother for $249. The Nespresso VertuoPlus Deluxe features a larger water tank and a capsule container. It provides a convenient and high-quality coffee experience with a smooth cup and signature crema.

articles.title: OpenAI wants to own it all
articles.author: Richard Waters
articles.summary: OpenAI aims to dominate the generative AI market by offering AI-powered services to businesses and governments. The company is targeting the enterprise market to generate revenue and fund its data center expansion. This includes providing tools for companies to build AI agents.

articles.title: AI & ice cream: ChatGPT CEO touts new tool for Albertsons to improve operations
articles.author: Don Day
articles.summary: Albertsons is utilizing ChatGPT to enhance merchandising in its stores by building intelligent agents that analyze categories and generate strategies. Albertsons also introduced 'ASK AI', an AI-enabled tool that allows customers to create shopping lists by typing in prompts.

articles.title: Record-breaking Dragons' Den offer in 20-year history with eye-watering amount
articles.author: Bethany Whittingham
articles.summary: Francisco Gimenez introduced Yuv, a smart hair color dispensing system, on Dragon's Den. The system automates hair color mixing and tracks client history via an app. Gimenez secured investments of £250k each from Sara Davies and Steven Bartlett for one percent equity, resulting in a total deal of £500,000 for a one percent stake.

articles.title: 9 things it's hard to believe didn't exist in our lives before the 50s
articles.author: Robert Cumber
articles.summary: Volvo introduced the three-point seat belt in 1959 and allowed other car makers to use it for free. In 1954, Tayto introduced cheese and onion flavored crisps.  Marc Grégoire invented the non-stick pan, and in 1956, he and his wife Colette launched the Tefal Corporation.

articles.title: 9 things it's hard to believe didn't exist in our lives before the 50s
articles.author: Robert Cumber
articles.summary: Marc Grégoire patented the technology for non-stick pans in 1954. In 1956, Grégoire and his wife, Colette, launched the Tefal Corporation to market the product. The company's name is a combination of the words Teflon and aluminum.

articles.title: Zing!: Cold foam-focused coffee concept with ‘retro charm' coming soon
articles.author: Jack McLaughlin
articles.summary: Zing, a new mobile coffee cart concept launched by Courtney Fetherolf, plans to introduce 'high energy, retro charm, and creative flair' to the Columbus coffee scene in Spring 2026. The cart's menu will focus on cold foam beverages and drinks like the Zing Shot, featuring espresso over ice, and will also offer a 12-ounce whole bean coffee called Daily Zing.

articles.title: The OnePlus 15 finally has an official launch date
articles.author: Craig Donaldson
articles.summary: OnePlus will launch the OnePlus 15 in China on October 27, alongside the OnePlus Ace 6. The OnePlus 15 will be available in absolute black, mist purple, and sand dune colors and is expected to have Qualcomm's Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 processor, a 165Hz OLED display, a square camera setup, and a 7,000mAh battery with 100W charging.  The global debut of the OnePlus 15 is speculated for November 13.

articles.title: How a former Mozilla CMO uses AI to create a new cannabis cocktail brand
articles.author: Alistair Barr
articles.summary: Jascha Kaykas-Wolff and Alexandra Roberts are launching "Eleanore", a cannabis-infused cocktail, in early 2026. They utilized AI tools such as ChatGPT, Claude, ElevenLabs, and Lovable to expedite development, reduce costs, and enhance creative processes for the Eleanore brand, which includes web design, marketing, and product R&D. The project, which would traditionally take months and significant investment, was completed in a fraction of the time and cost using AI.

articles.title: Schneider Electric Canada opens new distribution centre in Ont.
articles.summary: Schneider Electric Canada introduced a new distribution center. This new center aims to bring manufacturing operations closer to Canadian customers, implying improved service.

articles.title: China's services exports gain momentum
articles.summary: Alibaba's wholesale marketplace, 1688, has launched a cross-border supply chain zone. This zone aims to attract service providers who can support international buyers. It is designed to streamline logistics, payments, customs clearance, and quality inspection for international e-commerce transactions.

articles.title: 5 Viral Skincare Products Under RM50 That Are All Over Your FYP
articles.author: Arina Fizan
articles.summary: The article features five affordable skincare products under RM50: Eucerin ProACNE Solution Gel to Foam Cleanser, The Ordinary Niacinamide 10% + Zinc 1% Serum, Hada Labo Hydrating Lotion, Skintific 5X Ceramide Barrier Repair Moisturiser, and Beauty of Joseon Relief Sun: Rice + Probiotics SPF50+. These products address various skin concerns like acne, hydration, and sun protection, catering to students and budget-conscious consumers.

articles.title: Dirty Mountain Dew Cream Soda Dew Is A Confusing Mix Of Flavors
articles.author: Dani Zoeller
articles.summary: Mountain Dew is launching a new flavor called "Dirty Mountain Dew Cream Soda Dew" in early 2026, following a limited-time "Dirty MTN Dew Baja Blast Dream Soda" at Taco Bell in 2025. This new beverage aims to emulate the taste of a dirty soda by blending citrus with a smoother cream flavor, and will be available in both regular and zero-sugar versions.

articles.title: Nouvelle Lune du 21 octobre : comment va-t-elle impacter tous les signes ?
articles.author: Julie Patriat
articles.summary: An apparel company is promoting a new line of high-end baby clothes. The company uses targeted advertising by creating profiles of young, wealthy parents through an agency that works with high-end supermarkets. These profiles are used to present advertising within partner apps.

articles.title: Meghan Markle suffers backlash over new Duchess of Sussex-branded bag
articles.author: GB News
articles.summary: Meghan Markle introduced a new 'Duchess of Sussex-branded bag' through her social media platform.

articles.title: Spotify announces vague "AI music products"
articles.author: AV Club
articles.summary: Spotify is introducing AI-powered 'music products' designed to empower artists and songwriters. These products aim to connect artists with their fans. The platform is expanding its offerings with these new AI tools.

articles.title: fullthrottle.ai® Launches the Industry's First Generative AI-Powered Automotive DSP Advancing Tierless Automotive Marketing Using Patented First-Party Household Identity
articles.author: Fullthrottle Technologies
articles.summary: FullThrottle Technologies, LLC launched The Automotive DSP™, a generative AI-powered platform for tierless automotive marketing. The platform unifies audience creation, omnichannel activation, and real-time attribution across dealers, dealership groups, and OEMs. It leverages first-party data and AI-driven media activation to drive vehicle sales and service lane conversions.

articles.title: fullthrottle.ai® Launches the Industry's First Generative AI-Powered Automotive DSP Advancing ...
articles.author: Full Throttle Technologies
articles.summary: FullThrottle Technologies, LLC launched The Automotive DSP™, a generative AI-powered platform for tierless automotive marketing. Built on the fullthrottle.ai platform, it unifies audience creation, omnichannel activation, and real-time attribution, providing direct access to premium inventory, audience data, and attribution for OEMs, dealer groups, media companies, and agencies.

articles.title: Generative Engine Optimization (GEO): The Geometrika Platform Now Measures Brand Visibility in AI Search
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Geometrika has launched its new Generative Engine Optimization (GEO) platform designed to help businesses measure, analyze, and enhance their brand presence in AI-generated search results and chatbot responses. The GEO platform offers comprehensive AI brand measurement and LLM search analytics to provide a competitive edge and drive high-value traffic. Geometrika is now available, with plans designed for businesses of all sizes.

articles.title: Generative Engine Optimization (GEO): The Geometrika Platform Now Measures Brand Visibility in AI Search
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Geometrika has launched its new Generative Engine Optimization (GEO) platform. The GEO platform is a suite of tools designed to empower companies to measure, analyze, and enhance their brand presence in AI-generated search results and chatbot responses. The platform enables businesses to gain a competitive edge, drive high-value traffic, make data-driven strategic decisions, and proactively manage brand reputation in the AI ecosystem.

articles.title: Redmagic 11 Pro is the first phone with liquid cooling
articles.author: Dominic Preston
articles.summary: Redmagic has launched its latest gaming phone in China, featuring an active liquid cooling system and a large 8,000mAh battery. The phone also includes a Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5, a 144Hz display, 120W wired charging, and haptic shoulder buttons. A global launch will be announced November 3rd.

articles.title: Cura Unveils First-of-Its-Kind Peptide Hair Growth Serum Manufactured at Scale in the United States
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Cura announced the launch of its consumer product. This product is derived from a newly discovered class of bioactive peptides. The product represents a new frontier for non-invasive hair and scalp support.

articles.title: First National Bank marks 10 years in Ghana
articles.summary: First National Bank launched a digital-first banking approach in Ghana, providing customers with mobile banking apps, ATMs, and online platforms. The bank is also developing a next-generation banking platform to improve customer experience across various banking segments.

articles.title: Lava Shark 2 Confirmed To Launch Soon in India With 5,000mAh Battery; Check Specifications and Features
articles.author: Team Latestly
articles.summary: Lava Mobiles is launching the Shark 2 smartphone, featuring a 5,000mAh battery and IP54 splash resistance. The Shark 2 will also have a triple-camera setup with a 50MP primary camera, with rumours suggesting 18W wired USB Type-C charging and a 6.75-inch 120Hz display.

articles.title: Marks & Spencer fans racing to tills for 'flattering' new midi dress in two colours
articles.summary: Marks & Spencer has launched the 'Jersey Cosy Midi Column Dress' for €49 in 'claret' and 'neutral' colors. Dunnes Stores is offering the 'Savida Check Pleat Mini Skirt' for €25 and the 'Savida Faux Fur Coat' for €50, both available in stores and online.

articles.title: Re-imagining Neo-Pragmatic Lifestyle: EPWK Launches Strategic Upgrade with "EPWK Curated Goods"
articles.author: PR Newswire
org: Xiamen EPWK Network Technology Co., Ltd
articles.summary: EPWK is launching a Chinese and English e-commerce platform called "EPWK Curated Goods," a creative physical product marketplace. This platform will focus on creative physical products that combine outstanding design, practical function, and emotional resonance. This launch marks a strategic upgrade for EPWK, transitioning from a creative service ecosystem to directly shaping consumer lifestyles.

articles.title: âHot ice creamâ? Tyra Banksâ new dessert invention has everyone curious
articles.author: TOI Lifestyle Desk
articles.summary: Tyra Banks' company, Smize & Dream, is launching a new product called "Hot Mama," described as "the world's first HOT ice cream experience." This innovative dessert is a warm, sippable version of ice cream, designed to offer a unique twist on a classic treat.

articles.title: Huawei Unveils Upgraded AI WAN Solution with AI-Centric Architecture to Boost Carrier Growth
articles.summary: Huawei unveiled an upgraded AI WAN solution. The solution features an AI-centric architecture. The architecture is designed to boost carrier growth.

articles.title: Toonstar's new ‘Uncle Roger' cartoon embraces AI—but slop it's not
articles.author: Harry McCracken
articles.summary: Toonstar is launching "Fried," an animated series featuring Uncle Roger, which utilizes AI in its production process.  The company is also expanding its "StEvEn & Parker" franchise with a smartphone game and graphic novel series. These initiatives reflect Toonstar's strategy to leverage AI for faster production and creative risk-taking across multiple platforms.

articles.title: Treasure Data Achieves the AWS Generative AI Competency
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Treasure Data achieved the AWS Generative AI Competency, enabling them to introduce AI Agent Foundry and AI Suites. The AI Agent Foundry empowers enterprises to build AI agents on their customer data, automating data pipelines, analysis, content generation, personalization, and campaign optimization on top of data in the Intelligent CDP.

articles.title: Alibaba confident AI tools will drive sales and empower Singles' Day shoppers
articles.author: Ann Cao
articles.summary: Alibaba is deploying Qwen's large language models (LLMs) on Taobao and Tmall, integrating them into the platforms' core search and recommendation engines. This large-scale deployment of generative AI aims to improve user experience and drive sales, with early results showing a 20% improvement in relevant search results, a 12% increase in advertising return, and a 10% increase in click-through rates.

articles.title: Walmart's GE Profile Nugget Ice Maker is on sale for almost $200 off
articles.author: Josie Howell
articles.summary: Walmart launched a new round of rollbacks, highlighting a deal on the GE Profile Opal Nugget Ice Maker, now priced at $358 (originally $548). This countertop ice maker produces soft, chewable nugget ice and is available on Walmart.com.

articles.title: Streamoid Launches CXO, an AI Command Center for Brands
articles.author: PTI
articles.summary: Streamoid has launched CXO, an AI-powered command center designed to unify product data, design, and catalog workflows. CXO combines three core modules that reflect common brand workflows namely Artifax, Photogenix and Catalogix. The platform aims to help brands make faster product decisions, improve launch speed, reduce production costs, and increase first-week sell-through.

articles.title: Bargain buy to make your sofa look brand new with minimal effort slashed by 30% in sale
articles.author: Maleeha Katib
articles.summary: Dunelm is having a clearance sale with discounts up to 50% on various homeware items.  The Isla Two Seater Sofa Cover is on sale for £28, and other items like artificial sweet pea stems and pumpkin canisters are also discounted. Dunelm is also promoting interior trends for 2025, including Maximalism, Minimaluxe, The Edit, and New Nouveau.

articles.title: Toyota Could Unveil The New FJ Cruiser Soon – What We Know So Far
articles.summary: Toyota is expected to debut its new Land Cruiser FJ, a compact off-roader SUV, next week. The Land Cruiser FJ will be built in Thailand and exported globally, launching in Japan by mid-2026. It may use a 2.7-litre four-cylinder engine, with possible turbocharged or hybrid variants for North America.

articles.title: Pepper Content rebrands as Pepper, introduces AI-native marketing model
articles.author: Best Media Info Bureau 17
articles.summary: Pepper Content has rebranded as Pepper, repositioning itself as an AI-native marketing services platform. This includes a new logo, visual identity, tagline, and expanded AI-driven services designed to enhance content creation and performance. The company aims to offer a faster and more scalable alternative to traditional marketing agencies and consultancies by integrating AI with freelance talent.

articles.title: Strengthen Thinning Hair with This Powder-to-Cream Conditioner
articles.author: Jasmine Washington
articles.summary: The Powder Shampoo has launched The Powder Conditioner, a powder-to-cream conditioner available in hydrating volume and nourishing repair formulas. This product reduces environmental impact by eliminating water content and comes in refillable packaging. The company also plants one tree for every product sold.

articles.title: 7 Best New Kohl's Gift Finds Hitting Shelves This Week — Best Life
articles.author: Leah Barrett
articles.summary: Kohl's is offering a variety of new gift options, including the Koolaburra by UGG Wiona Melange Sherpa Throw, MAISON DE BASE 12-pk. Sugar Body Scrubs Holiday Set, Yankee Candle® 3-pc. Sweater Weather Mini Candle Set, Nintendo NES Cartridge Drink Coasters set, LANEIGE Midnight Minis Lip Glowy Balm and Lip Sleeping Mask Gift Set, and the SEPHORA COLLECTION Premium Makeup & Skincare Advent Calendar Gift Set. These products are available at Kohl's and on their website.

articles.title: 38 Useful Products You'll Want For Their Beauty
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Several new products are being introduced, including Wicked: For Good laundry detergent with a "Fantabulous Floral" scent, Vaseline Golden Hour Glow Body Gel providing subtle shimmer and hydration, and Hanalei Lip Treatment for overnight lip restoration. Additionally, Our Place launched the "Dream Cooker" with multiple cooking modes, and Bella introduced the VersaBrew 2-in-1 Coffee Maker that accommodates both coffee pots and single-serve pods.

articles.title: Every new middle of Lidl bargain hitting shop shelves on Sunday
articles.author: Amelia Morgan
articles.summary: Lidl is launching new products, including the Cien Beauty Black Ionic Hairdryer for £9.99 for Lidl Plus customers, the Cien Beauty Hair Straightening Brush for £12.99 for Lidl Plus customers, the Livarno Home LED Light-Up Shower Head for £7.99, and DIY tools such as the Parkside 4V Cordless Tracker/Nailer for £12.99. These products are available in Lidl stores from October 19th while stocks last.

articles.title: Here's How To Create A Luxurious Bed Without Spending A Fortune
articles.author: Jennifer Samson-Acker
articles.summary: Target offers Threshold's 400 thread count sheets, noted for their deep pockets, durable cotton material, and helpful tags. Target also sells a textured cotton duvet cover with a two-tone design and fringed shams. Additionally, a premium down alternative comforter from Target is available in full/queen or king sizes.

articles.title: The best webcam for your PC is already in your pocket
articles.author: Yadullah Abidi
articles.summary: Microsoft's Phone Link app enables Windows 11 users to utilize their Android or iOS smartphones as webcams, offering a wireless and convenient solution with features like background blur and auto-framing. The app requires both the PC and smartphone to have the latest versions of the Link to Windows app and to be on the same Wi-Fi network for seamless integration and improved video call quality.

articles.title: Sundar Pichai opens up on the launch of OpenAI's ChatGPT before Google's chatbot, compares with YouTube, Instagram
articles.summary: OpenAI launched ChatGPT in 2022, prompting Google to react, with CEO Sundar Pichai acknowledging OpenAI's first-to-market advantage. Google, already working on AI, later released its chatbot, Gemini, in March 2023, after initially delaying due to reputational concerns.

articles.title: Адылбек Касымалиев провел совещание по вопросам обеспечения внутреннего рынка нефтепродуктами — Tazabek
articles.author: Tazabek.KG
articles.summary: Pinterest has introduced new AI controls, allowing users to exert more control over the amount of generative AI content in their feeds. Users can limit generative AI content in specific categories like beauty, fashion, art, and home decor, via the app's Settings menu.  These AI features are currently available on the Pinterest website and Android app, with an iOS version coming soon.

articles.title: Impressive MG ZS Pro to further boost British marque's local stock
articles.author: Jaco Van Der Merwe
articles.summary: MG Motor South Africa has launched the MG ZS Pro, a replacement for the aging ZS, positioned as a more upmarket option. The ZS Pro features a turbocharged 1.5-litre engine, improved dimensions, striking new looks, and a plush interior with advanced technology and safety features. The two-derivative ZS Pro line-up starts with the Comfort at R397 600 and the top-of-the-range MG ZS Pro Luxury costs R431 500.

articles.title: Nan Xiang Express, Kura Sushi coming to Mercer on One
articles.author: Kimberly Redmond
articles.summary: Nan Xiang Express is opening its first New Jersey location on October 18 at Mercer on One, offering a scaled-down version of its Michelin-recommended menu with soup dumplings and promotions for the grand opening. Kura Revolving Sushi Bar plans to open a new restaurant by the end of October, featuring a menu of over 140 authentic Japanese dishes and technology-enabled ordering.

articles.title: Pokemon Legends Z-A can be bought for £36.31 instead of £51.99 - here's how
articles.author: Lucy Farrell
articles.summary: Pokémon Legends: Z-A has been released for Switch and Switch 2, set in Lumiose City. Argos offers a deal for Lenovo Idea Tab for a lower price than Amazon using the code RED20 at checkouts.

articles.title: HONOR X7d brings premium drop protection and dedicated AI to entry-level market
articles.author: Manila Standard
articles.summary: HONOR Philippines has launched the HONOR X7d smartphone, featuring a 108MP camera, AI capabilities, and a robust design, including drop and water resistance. The phone has a pre-order period until October 24, 2025, which includes a free HONOR Camping Light Speaker. The 256GB variant is available online for P7,299, while the 512GB variant can be pre-ordered for P9,999.

articles.title: If Nobody Has Told You About These 52 Cheap Swaps For More Expensive Products Yet, Please Allow Me
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: EOS launched a limited edition Eos Marshmallow "Super Balm" lip treatment. Gold Bond introduced firming neck and chest cream with aloe, salicylic acid, and jojoba oil. Hawaiian Tropic released SPF 30 Mineral Powder Sunscreen Brush. Lottabody designed Coconut Oil Foaming Curl Mousse for all hair types. Catrice launched "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener. E.l.f. introduced Sheer For It Blush Tint, Lash XTNDR Tubing Mascara, and Squeeze Me More Lip Balm Duo. L'Oreal Paris launched Infallible 3-Second Setting Spray Mist. Billion Dollar Brows released Eyebrow Powder. Monday Haircare launched Dry Shampoo with added keratin. Olay released Firming Body Lotion with collagen peptides and a Vitamin B3 complex. Catrice created Magic Shaper Face Cream Palette. The Face Shop released Rice Water Bright Foaming Facial Cleanser and E.l.f released Holy Hydration! Thirst Burst Drops. MagicMinerals launched AirBrush Foundation. Essence launched Drop of Sunshine Bronzing Drops.

articles.title: Get Diwali-ready photos with Google Nano Banana AI: A step-by-step guide
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: Google has introduced its AI-powered image generation tool, Nano Banana, to Google Lens and AI Mode. This feature allows users to create images from text prompts, enabling the design of festive décor, outfits, and other creative concepts related to Diwali. Users can access the feature through the Google app, describing their desired image to generate visuals.

articles.title: The MSI Claw 8 AI+ is a ‘powerful but pricey handheld gaming PC'
articles.author: Steve Hogarty
articles.summary: MSI has launched the Claw 8 AI+, a revamped handheld gaming PC featuring a new Intel Lunar Lake processor, an 8-inch screen, and an 80Wh battery. The Claw 8 AI+ aims to offer improved power and performance, outperforming rivals in demanding games. It boasts a long-lasting battery and two Thunderbolt 4 ports, positioning itself as a powerful high-end gaming handheld.

articles.title: 50 Products For A Cleaner, More Organized Home
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: The article introduces a variety of new home cleaning and organizing products designed to simplify household tasks and improve organization. These products range from drain cleaners and air purifiers to storage solutions and cleaning tools, all aimed at enhancing the efficiency and aesthetics of home maintenance. The products highlighted offer solutions for various cleaning needs and organizational challenges.

articles.title: Aston Villa's adidas SPZL trainers drop online in limited launch
articles.author: Sutton Coldfield Observer
articles.summary: Adidas launched a limited edition of SPZL trainers online for Aston Villa on October 17, 2025. The launch is a new product offering for the football club's fans.

articles.title: Microsoft seeks to make most new products outside China from 2026, Nikkei says
articles.author: Tip Ranks
articles.summary: Microsoft intends to manufacture the majority of its new products, including servers and Surface laptops, outside of China starting in 2026. Amazon Web Services is reportedly pursuing a similar strategy.

articles.title: Dalla Sicilia a New York, Fiasconaro inaugura flagship store a Soho
articles.author: lamantiafabio80@gmail.com
articles.summary: Fiasconaro has inaugurated a new flagship store in Soho, New York. The company is expanding its presence from Sicily to New York with this new location.

articles.title: Forget Smart TVs, This New AI TV Is Basically Your New Chillest Housemate
articles.author: Chandini Del
articles.summary: LG is launching its 2025 AI TV, which adapts to user preferences through features like AI Brightness Control, AI Super Upscaling, and AI Voice ID.  Additionally, LG introduces the Home Theater Soundbar S95TR, which paired with the TV offers WOW Synergy features like WOW Orchestra and WOW Interface, enhancing the audio experience with AI Room Calibration Pro.

articles.title: Amazon Prime Members Can Score This Handheld Cordless Vacuum for $46
articles.author: Toni Sutton
articles.summary: The Ayontin Cordless Handheld Vacuum is available for \$46 exclusively for Amazon Prime members. This compact vacuum features dual suction modes, LED lights, a one-touch dustbin, and comes with a charging dock and reusable HEPA filters. The article also highlights other cleaning products available on Amazon such as the Bissell Crosswave Pet Pro Wet-Dry Vacuum Cleaner, Xiebro Robot Vacuum and Mop Combo and Hoover Powerscrub XL Carpet Cleaner

articles.title: Tyra Banks launches 'hot ice cream.' Say what!
articles.summary: Tyra Banks's ice cream company, Smize & Dream, is launching a new product called "Hot Mama," described as a "hot ice cream experience." Inspired by Banks's mother and childhood memories, Hot Mama will be available in the US this winter after its initial viral success in Australia. It is described as liquid, sippable hot ice cream.

articles.title: This smart diffuser is making homes smell like a 'five-star hotel' - we found out if it's worth the hype
articles.author: EMILY SCRIVENER
articles.summary: ScentAir has introduced the ScentAir Whisper, a smart diffuser designed to provide professional-quality fragrances for homes. The device can be controlled via a mobile app, offering scent schedules and intensity adjustments and can be controlled through Alexa or Google assistant. A variety of ScentAir Whisper™ HOME fragrance cartridges are available, including the £69 White Tea & Thyme ScentAir Whisper™ HOME fragrance cartridge.

articles.title: On the trail of Blacksburg's (and Appalachia's) native tropical fruit, the pawpaw
articles.author: Steketee
articles.summary: Big Lick Ice Cream Co. owners Lindsay Lindberg and Nathan Lindberg sell handcrafted ice cream with pawpaw flavor. They initially ordered frozen pulp from a farm but now buy their pawpaw from Onyx. They hope to harvest pawpaw from their own orchard in the coming years.

articles.title: Sundar Pichai Admits Google Was Ready for ChatGPT but Moved Too Cautiously in AI Race
articles.author: Kahekashan
articles.summary: OpenAI's launch of ChatGPT in late 2022 prompted Google to accelerate its AI development, leading to the launch of Bard in March 2023, which later evolved into Gemini. This marked Google's strategic comeback and reassertion of its role in AI, driven by both innovation and a commitment to reliability.

articles.title: Laundry You IPO funds to be used to grow store network
articles.author: Kuakul Mornkum
articles.summary: Laundry You plans to expand its WashXpress launderette chain, targeting 160 new outlets by 2026-2027, after an IPO. The company also intends to enhance its service offerings by introducing wash-and-fold, clothes binding, and delivery services.

articles.title: ⚡Android 16-Based OxygenOS 16 Released; Check Eligible Devices, Features and More
articles.summary: OnePlus has released OxygenOS 16, which is based on Android 16 and delivers various updates and improvements. This new OS offers AI-powered features, improved performance, and expanded customization options for several OnePlus devices.

articles.title: Adidas' Iconic Sambae Sneakers Are on Sale for Just $66, and They Come in 15 Colors
articles.author: The Capital Journal
articles.summary: Adidas is offering a 40% discount on a reimagined version of its classic Samba shoe.

articles.title: First drive: Is the Toyota Ativ hybrid worth the three-year wait for its PH arrival?
articles.summary: Toyota has introduced the all-new Toyota Ativ in the Philippine market, replacing the previous Vios generation. The Ativ is available with 1.3-liter and 1.5-liter engines, including a top-spec 1.5 HEV CVT hybrid version, with prices ranging from P918,000 to P1,198,000.

articles.title: CP LAND Unveils 'Paul' to Elevate Design Communication
articles.summary: CP LAND Public Company Limited launched 'Paul,' an AI persona that serves as an AI Brand Ambassador, Strategic Partner, and Design Expert. This launch accompanies a new online program, 'Archi-Talks by Paul', which explores architecture and aesthetics in real estate. Paul's introduction represents CP LAND's commitment to quality and design, aiming to enhance living through empathy-driven innovation and meaningful design.

articles.title: Samsung Maintains No 5 Spot Globally in Interbrand 2025 Rankings for 6th Consecutive Year
articles.author: ANI
articles.summary: Samsung ranks 5th in Interbrand's Best Global Brands for the 6th consecutive year. AI innovation and customer focus have propelled Samsung's brand value to $90.5 billion.

articles.title: 27 Must-Have Everlane Items You'll Absolutely Love
articles.author: Cierra Cowan
articles.summary: Everlane offers various new products like sweaters, bodysuits, trouser pants, dresses, t-shirts, jeans, sweatshirts, sweatshorts, blazers, mini dresses, skirts, loafers, tops, cardigans, blouses, pants, and boots. These items feature different styles, materials, and available sizes and colors, all offered at different prices and available for purchase.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Tab S11 Ultra review: the Everest of Android tablets isn't for everyone, and that's fine
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy Tab S11 Ultra, a new Android tablet featuring a 14.6-inch display, MediaTek Dimensity 9400+ processor, and improvements to DeX for enhanced productivity. The tablet includes a 12MP front camera, 13MP + 8MP rear cameras, and comes with 12/16GB RAM and 256GB/512GB/1TB storage options and runs on Android 16 w/ OneUI 8. It comes with an 11,600mAh battery with 45W wired charging support. Priced at $1200/£1199, the Galaxy Tab S11 Ultra is available in grey or silver colors and is positioned as a high-end option for users seeking a large-screen Android tablet for productivity and creative tasks.

articles.title: China's Largest Shopping Festival Launches Early in Efforts to Revitalize Spending Amid Economic Challenges
articles.author: Daniel Foster
articles.summary: Alibaba, the parent company of e-commerce giants Taobao, Tmall, and AliExpress, launched its '11.11 Global Shopping Festival' early on October 15th, integrating Artificial Intelligence to enhance the customer journey. Other platforms, including JD.com and Douyin, are also prominently featuring '11.11' promotions with discounts and vouchers on their applications. This AI integration includes personalized product recommendations and optimized inventory management.

articles.title: OPPO Find X9 Series to launch globally, redefining mobile imaging
articles.author: Al Bawaba
articles.summary: OPPO, a leading smart device brand, announced the global launch of its new flagship Find X9 Series. This launch follows the product's successful introduction.

articles.title: À Paris, Kristen Stewart porte les baskets les plus tendances (et les plus demandées) de la saison
articles.author: Ana Serrano
articles.summary: An apparel company aims to promote its new line of high-end baby clothes by creating targeted advertising profiles. The company works with an agency to identify wealthy young parents or couples likely to purchase the new baby clothing line, enabling advertising within partner apps based on those profiles.

articles.title: Skoda Octavia RS Launched At Rs 49.99 Lakh In India — Performance Sedan Makes A Comeback
articles.summary: Skoda India has launched the Octavia RS, a performance sedan, priced at Rs 49.99 lakh (ex-showroom). The car features a 2.0-litre TSI turbocharged petrol engine, sport-tuned suspension, distinctive RS styling cues and a 13-inch touchscreen infotainment system.

articles.title: SpaceX Gains NVIDIA DGX Spark: AI Supercomputer Boost
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: NVIDIA launched DGX Spark, a desktop AI system powered by the GB10 Grace Blackwell Superchip, delivering up to 1 petaflop of AI performance. This product targets developers and researchers, providing them with local, high-performance AI workstation. Major PC manufacturers like Acer, ASUS, Dell, HP, Lenovo, and MSI are partnering with NVIDIA to create integrated systems optimized for AI workflows, accelerating the adoption of AI across various industries.

articles.title: LiveX officially launches ‘Toms Hong Jin-kyung Edition Shampoo' in collaboration with Hong Jin-kyung
articles.author: Dr. Priya Deshmukh
articles.summary: LIVEX has launched 'Tamz Hong Jin-kyung Edition Shampoo,' Korea's first UV-blocking hair loss shampoo. The product features UV protection, vegan ingredients, camellia stem cell exosomes and a patented hair growth promoter. It aims to redefine scalp health and is available through major distribution channels.

articles.title: KB Life announced on the 21st that it will open a 'Generative AI Agent service' that innovates the w..
articles.author: The Last Day
articles.summary: KB Life has launched a 'Generative AI Agent service'. This service includes AI agents specializing in insurance product counseling and marketing content production. The goal is to enhance non-face-to-face sales, streamline internal operations, and improve customer experience.

articles.title: 27 Urban Outfitters Home Products You'll Love
articles.author: Griffin Gonzales
articles.summary: The article presents a variety of new home decor products, including a pancake stack candle, a glass-block lamp, a 3D-printed polymer lamp, and an ultra-minimalist bookcase. Other new products include a wooden desk, a cane-headboard platform bed, a floral-print duvet cover set, and a circular swivel chair, all with unique features and design aesthetics.

articles.title: Sundar Pichai says Google was ready for ChatGPT, it just did not ship its AI fast enough
articles.summary: In response to OpenAI's ChatGPT, Google launched Bard (later Gemini) in March 2023.  Google had been developing advanced chatbot technology and launched Bard as its formal re-entry into the AI conversation.

articles.title: Yiwu Global Digital Trade Center Opens, Setting Worldwide Digital Commerce Benchmark
articles.author: PR Newswire
org: Yiwu China Commodities City Big Data Co., Ltd.
articles.summary: Yiwu has launched the Yiwu Global Digital Trade Center, integrating zones for market, offices, and a Digital Trade Hub. The center offers AI tools like "Xiaoshang AI Video Creator" to vendors for creating promotional videos and AI-driven navigation for buyers. Additionally, the center supports end-to-end digital commerce with platforms such as Chinagoods for digital trading, a supply-chain platform for efficient logistics, and Yiwu Pay for settlements.

articles.title: Anthropic's Claude now comes with customizable skills for enhanced productivity
articles.summary: Anthropic has launched Skills for Claude, a new feature designed to make its AI chatbot more customizable and efficient. Skills include instructions, scripts, and resources that Claude can load to handle specific tasks, working with platforms like Excel, and adhering to brand guidelines. Major companies such as Box, Rakuten, and Canva have already started using this tool across different platforms like Claude.ai, Claude Code, Anthropic's API, and the Claude Agent SDK.

articles.title: Anthropic launches 'Skills for Claude' to boost chatbot's productivity, customization
articles.summary: Anthropic has launched 'Skills for Claude,' a new feature enhancing the AI chatbot's customizability. It allows users to create and use skills tailored to specific jobs across platforms like Claude.ai and Anthropic's API. Companies like Box, Rakuten, and Canva are already using the tool to improve Claude's AI agent capabilities.

articles.title: Manoj Singh on how Cornitos is using performance marketing to turn cravings into conversions
articles.author: Adgully Bureau
articles.summary: Cornitos has launched several new products and flavors to cater to the evolving snacking preferences of Indian consumers. New introductions include Crusties Puffs, as well as new flavors such as Korean Chilli and Honey Chilli Potato. The company also focuses on healthier options, incorporating ingredients like quinoa, beetroot, and spinach into their products to align with the trend of mindful indulgence.

articles.title: OnePlus 15 launch date revealed: Check leaked design, battery, camera, display and other details
articles.summary: OnePlus is launching the OnePlus 15 and Ace 6 in China on October 27th. The OnePlus 15 will feature a 6.7-inch OLED display with a 165Hz refresh rate, a Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset, and a 50-megapixel triple camera. Leaks suggest it may have a 7,300mAh battery with 120W fast charging.

articles.title: In The Near Future Data Center SSDS Will Require Liquid Cooling
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Solidigm demonstrated a prototype liquid cooled SSD. The SSD is intended for data center use and is based upon PCIe 6.0 and later generation SSDs.

articles.title: Candy Dart Water Heater Becomes a Top Seller in the Philippines! Influencer Reviews and Shopee 10.10 Mega Sale Drive Brand Buzz
articles.author: Pr Newswire
articles.summary: Candy, an Italian home appliance brand, launched the Dart Series instant water heater in the Philippines, designed for tropical climates. The product launch included influencer marketing and promotional offers on Shopee, resulting in strong sales during the Shopee 10.10 Mega Sale. The Dart Series features instant heating, energy efficiency, and Patented Shock Proof Technology.

articles.title: MSU women's soccer upsets Indiana University, 2-0 at DeMartin Soccer Stadium
articles.summary: StateNews.com has launched a new version of its website, inviting users to test drive it today.

articles.title: HONOR launches new Experience Store at Mid Valley
articles.summary: HONOR Malaysia has launched its upgraded Experience Store at Mid Valley Megamall, Kuala Lumpur, on Oct 17. The launch promotes several new products including the HONOR MagicBook Art 14, MagicPad 3, Pad 10 WiFi, HONOR CHOICE Robot Cleaner, HONOR Magic Series smartphone and the new X9d 5G, featuring hands-on experiences and demonstrations of the devices' capabilities, such as the X9d 5G's durability and the Magic V5's AI features and also the HONOR Connect feature.

articles.title: Lady Louise Windsor est-elle le nouvel espoir de la famille royale ?
articles.author: Isaac Bickerstaff
articles.summary: An apparel company is promoting its new line of high-end baby clothes. The company uses an agency to create profiles of wealthy young parents or couples with new children. These profiles will be used to present advertising within partner apps.

articles.title: 34 Products That Solve Annoying Things Around The House You've Ignored, But Now Won't Be Able To Unsee
articles.author: Mallory Mower
articles.summary: The article introduces a range of new home improvement and cleaning products, including the Ruggable machine-washable rug, peel-and-stick subway tile backsplash, Windex outdoor glass cleaner, and The Pink Stuff All-Purpose Floor Cleaner. These products offer innovative solutions for cleaning, organizing, and enhancing the aesthetics of various spaces in the home.

articles.title: Developers of would-be data center in Springdale offer first testimony to council
articles.author: Pittsburgh Tribune Review
articles.summary: Developers have presented the initial component of a potential new product or service. Further details, when available, will clarify the product's features, target audience, and intended market impact. This initial presentation marks the beginning of its introduction to the market.

articles.title: Scouted: Ruggable Just Launched an All-in-One Take on Its Machine-Washable Rugs
articles.summary: Ruggable has launched its innovative 'One-Piece Washable Rug Collection.' This new all-in-one system features rugs with ultra-grippy, built-in non-slip backing and vibrant, long-lasting colors that resist fading after washing. The new Ruggable rug is easier to fit in the wash than previous models.

articles.title: Tyra Banks is launching ‘hot ice cream' and the internet is a bit cold about it
articles.summary: Tyra Banks' company, Smize & Dream, is launching a new product called 'Hot Mama,' described as 'the world's first HOT ice cream experience.' This sippable, melted ice cream product is set to launch in the US.

articles.title: Scouted: Ruggable Just Launched an All-in-One Take on Its Machine-Washable Rugs
articles.author: Layne Van Vranken
articles.summary: Ruggable has launched a new product line called All-in-One rugs, designed as a single-piece system that eliminates the need for a separate rug pad. These rugs are available in Tufted and Plush textures, with prices starting at $119 and $439 respectively, and are engineered to fit standard washing machines.

articles.title: Anthropic Enhances Claude with Advanced Skills: A Focus on Content Writing for The Register
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Anthropic is introducing 'Skills,' a new feature for its Claude AI model, enabling paying customers to customize the AI with specific functionalities. These Skills equip Claude with specialized knowledge, allowing it to perform tasks requiring application-specific knowledge, such as interacting with third-party platforms or generating presentations. Anthropic also provides tools to simplify the creation of Skills, while cautioning about potential security risks.

articles.title: Natural Nine Strengthens Presence in the Personal Care Market with Research-Driven Innovation
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Natural Nine has seen success with its Leoclean Men's Cleanser and foam-type Leoclean Deodorant, which addresses common issues found in roll-on deodorants. The company is planning to launch a women's cleanser in March next year, aiming to provide a safe and gentle product for sensitive areas.

articles.title: Can Western Digital's (WDC) New AI Lab Transform Its Competitive Edge in Storage Solutions?
articles.author: Simply Wall St
articles.summary: Western Digital has expanded its System Integration and Test Lab in Rochester to accelerate the qualification and delivery of high-capacity storage products. This facility supports rapid innovation and reliable performance for AI and cloud workloads and enables deeper customer engagement and rapid validation of new products.

articles.title: Julius Berger urges investment in youth development, wins Top 50 Brands Award
articles.author: Amos
articles.summary: Julius Berger Nigeria Plc has invested in local production with its furniture factory, AFP, in Abuja, manufacturing luxury furniture, and ABUMET, specializing in aluminum and glass products. The company emphasizes the importance of investing in the local market to create employment opportunities for young people.

articles.title: Padu, a data center company, announced on the 17th that it participated in the "Open Compute Project..
articles.author: A Broadcasting Fan
articles.summary: Padu presented its vision for future SSDs optimized for AI data centers at the Open Compute Project Global Summit 2025. They showcased the next-generation 'E2' SSD and collaborated with AData and Giga Computing to introduce a Padu controller-based SSD and a data center server system, aiming to redefine performance and energy efficiency in the AI era.

articles.title: How UBA is redefining customer experience
articles.author: Collins Nweze
articles.summary: United Bank for Africa (UBA) has integrated the Pan-African Payment and Settlement System (PAPSS) into its AI-powered chatbot, LEO. This integration allows for instant, seamless, and secure cross-border payments in local currencies between African countries, making UBA the first financial institution to enable such payments on a chatbot platform in Africa.

articles.title: If Your Birth Year Starts With '19', These 47 'Boring' Products Will Probably Excite You
articles.author: Samar Hadri
articles.summary: The provided text highlights the introduction of various new products and services. SweatBlock antiperspirant wipes offer sweat protection, while Monday Haircare Dry Shampoo revives greasy hair. Medicube's "Zero Pore" Pads exfoliate and refine pores, Qualify's chocolate brownie protein powder provides a plant-based protein option, and TBH too nice Tineco 2-in-1 cordless vacuum provides 2-in-1 cleaning. Additionally, Bissell multipurpose carpet and upholstery cleaner is designed to clean different surfaces, Rael "Miracle Invisible Spot Cover" Pimple Patches helps with the skin issues and Venus Visage teeth whitening pens brighten teeth.

articles.title: Shaping Tomorrow - Shaping a smarter, more connected Singapore
articles.author: CNA
articles.summary: Amazon Web Services (AWS) is enabling faster and safer drone traffic management for the RSAF. Additionally, AWS is assisting SaladStop! in developing an AI-powered nutrition assistant. These efforts aim to help Singapore innovate.

articles.title: 36 Must-Have Products For An Organized Home
articles.author: Lily Burrill
articles.summary: Various organization products are launched, including honeycomb drawer inserts for organizing small items, storage lid organizers for Tupperware, glass jars with bamboo lids for bathroom essentials, and minimalist silverware trays for kitchen tools. Velvet hangers, laundry folding boards, wall-mounted racks, acrylic beauty organizers, and over-the-cabinet storage systems are also introduced to declutter various spaces in the home.

articles.title: Taco Bell Testing 'Big Flavor' Items in Multiple Cities This Month
articles.author: Marisa Losciale
articles.summary: Taco Bell is testing new menu items in Dallas, Nashville, Minneapolis, Knoxville and Indianapolis. New items include a revamped Cantina Fajita menu, Gordita Crunch Sliders, Diablo Nuggets, Crispy Chicken Crunchwrap Sliders, and Green Chile Queso with the Chicken Queso Burrito and Chips & Queso.

articles.title: This Vibrator Promises An Orgasm 97% of the Time: So What's the Catch?
articles.author: Rollingstone
articles.summary: Womanizer has released the Next Duo, a product designed to enhance sexual pleasure.

articles.title: Dragon's Den stars offers biggest deal in the show's 20 year history with eye-watering amount for just 1 percent of a company
articles.author: CAROLINE PEACOCK
articles.summary: Francisco Gimenez's company, Yuv, has launched a smart hair colour dispensing system that automatically mixes the perfect shade for every client and tracks colour usage through an app. The company is seeking £250k investment for 1% of the company. Sara Davies and Steven Bartlett have offered Francisco Gimenez  £250k for 1% of his business.

articles.title: Patent Services USA Clarifies Industry Misconceptions with Transparent, Flat-Rate Patent Solutions for American Inventor
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Patent Services USA introduces transparent, flat-rate patent services for inventors, delivered through a network of registered U.S. patent attorneys. The services include drafting and filing patent applications, USPTO filing fees, drawings, project management, and animated prototypes, all offered in comprehensive, flat-rate packages. Additionally, Patent Services USA provides performance-based marketing and licensing support on a commission-only basis.

articles.title: OnePlus 15 launch date revealed: Check leaked design, battery, camera, display and other details
articles.author: India Today
articles.summary: OnePlus has a revealed launch date for an upcoming product. Details such as design, battery, camera, and display specifications have been leaked, suggesting new features or improvements.

articles.title: 5 star safety car in Samadon Motors
articles.summary: Maruti Suzuki launched the Victoris SUV at Samadon Maruti Arena Showroom. The new SUV features an 8-speaker Infinity by Harman sound system, Alexa Auto voice AI, Level-II Advanced Driver Assistance System, and a sensor-enabled dicky, with prices ranging from Rs 10.5 lakh to Rs 23.5 lakh.

articles.title: Shanghai's Qingpu district ramps up high-quality growth of cosmetics sector
articles.author: Wang Xin
org: Integration Demonstration Zone Jiangnan Beauty Industry Research Center
articles.summary: Nivea, a brand of Beiersdorf, is launching products in China featuring Thiamidol 630, a newly approved anti-spot ingredient. The Qingpu district supported Beiersdorf in the registration process, leading to the ingredient's approval by Chinese regulators. Beiersdorf plans to increase investment in the Chinese market to deliver innovative skincare experiences.

articles.title: These AI glasses promised to make me smarter, and all I got was Clippy for ...
articles.author: The Verge
articles.summary: The Verge is launching 'Optimizer,' a weekly newsletter by Victoria Song. This newsletter will dissect and discuss the latest phones, smartwatches, apps, and other gadgets.

articles.title: Ally Arrives: Xbox President Sarah Bond Explains New Handhelds Steep Price, Prioritizing ‘Windows Experience' and ...
articles.author: Variety
articles.summary: Xbox has released its new handheld device, the ROG Xbox Ally, and a pricier version. The device has been available for 24 hours.

articles.title: Indiegogo Launches Next-Generation Crowdfunding Platform
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Indiegogo launched a completely reimagined crowdfunding platform on October 17, 2025. The new platform introduces advanced creator tools, enhanced trust and verification, and a powerful new foundation. This launch marks the foundation for Indiegogo's next decade.

articles.title: Dragon Ball Fans Should Circle January 25 on Their Calendars
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: A new Dragon Ball game is set to be unveiled at a special event in January 2026.

articles.title: Package worth �56 million including smart sockets supplied to eligible OVO energy customers
articles.author: Manchester Evening News
articles.summary: OVO is offering select customers the opportunity to acquire various energy-efficient goods at no cost. This initiative potentially promotes the adoption of sustainable energy solutions through incentivized access to eco-friendly products.

articles.title: Spotify teams up with Sony, Universal, and Warner to develop ‘artist-first' AI tools
articles.author: Indian Express
articles.summary: Spotify is actively working towards the development of new products. This initiative suggests a focus on expanding its offerings and potentially introducing innovative services to its user base.
